DOC.brief_summary: This is a retrospective chart review meant to identify any factors that are correlated with and may possibly lead to postoperative nausea and vomiting in order to predict need for longer hospital stays and potentially decrease postoperative nausea and vomiting.
DOC.brief_title: Identifiable Factors That May Lead to Postoperative Nausea and Vomiting After Simple Laparoscopic Appendectomy
